pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Regression // Implements high-dimensional multivariate regression by stacked generalisation (Wolpert 1992 doi:10.1016/S0893-6080(05)80023-1). For positively correlated outcomes, a single multivariate regression is typically more predictive than multiple univariate regressions. Includes functions for model fitting, extracting coefficients, outcome prediction, and performance measurement.
